item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 7, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Just: Just a Command Runner (70 points | 24 comments)
2. I algorithmically donated $5000 to Open Source (192 points | 38 comments)
3. Protecting Undersea Internet Cables Is a Tech Nightmare (28 points | 20 comments)
4. MIT largest open-source car design dataset, incl aerodynamics, to speed design (31 points | 6 comments)

7. Helsing at Eurorust and the Oxidation of Defense (25 points | 11 comments)

10. Next-level frosted glass with backdrop-filter (302 points | 52 comments)
11. Can life emerge around a white dwarf? (74 points | 49 comments)
12. Ask HN: Next best to incorporate other than Delaware? (7 points | 4 comments)
13. FSharpPacker – compile F# scripts to executables (61 points | 6 comments)
14. My second year without a job (373 points | 548 comments)

21. The Curse of Recursion: Training on generated data makes models forget (2023) (95 points | 70 comments)
22. Mathics 7.0 – Open-source alternative to Mathematica (72 points | 12 comments)
23. Mistakes as a new manager (250 points | 105 comments)
24. Police illegally sell restricted weapons, supplying crime (84 points | 64 comments)
25. OpenAI Reinforcement Fine-Tuning Research Program (190 points | 45 comments)

29. MultiQueue-Based FPGA Routing: Relaxed A* Priority Ordering-Improved Parallelism [pdf] (34 points | 2 comments)
30. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (148 points | 76 comments)
